p: This review showed the intestinal anti-inflammatory profile of terpenes in experimental models related to inflammatory bowel diseases. The reported data suggest the therapeutic potential of natural products, especially of this chemical class, as a source for the development of new therapeutic agents, due to the broad and differentiated mechanisms of action of these metabolites ( Figure 13). Considering that the terpenoid compounds discussed in this review are found in many aromatic and medicinal plants, proof of their pharmacological activity may benefit the general population, increasing access to new therapies.
